#summary Where libproxy is today
#labels Featured

Current Release: 0.2.1

Features:
  * a stable API
  * proxy auto-detection (working PAC and WPAD implementations)
  * GNOME support
  * KDE support
  * NetworkManager support
  * System administrators can lock down proxy configuration
  * a command line utility which exposes the API

Bindings:
  * Python
  * .NET
